%>% \n  step_novel(all_nominal_predictors()) %>%\n                   \n  embed::step_woe(policy_sales_channel, region_code, outcome = vars(response)) %>%\n                   \n \nctrl <- finetune::control_sim_anneal(     \n     verbose = FALSE,\n     verbose_iter = TRUE,\n     parallel_over = \"everything\",\n     event_level = \"second\",\n     save_pred = TRUE,\n \n                   \nboost_tree_spec <- \n  boost_tree(\n    trees = 100L,\n   tree_depth = tune(),\n   learn_rate =  tune(),\n   min_n = tune(),\n   mtry = tune()\n  ) %>% \n  set_engine(engine =                \n\nburnin <- tune_grid(\n  wf,\n  grid = 4,\n  resamples = folds,\n  control = ctrl,\n  metrics = metric_set(roc_auc, accuracy),\n  param_info = param)\n\nxg_rs <-            \n```{r}\n#| label: glmnet \n   \nlogistic_reg_glmnet_spec <-\n  multinom_reg(penalty = tune(), mixture = tune()) %>%\n  set_engine('glmnet')\n\nwf <- workflow(rec %>% \n   ) %>%\n   dials::finalize(raw_df)                 \n\nglmnet_rs <- tune_grid(\n  wf,\n  grid = 9,\n  resamples = folds,\n  control = ctrl,\n  metrics = metric_set(roc_auc, accuracy),\n  param_info = param)\n\nshow_best(glmnet_rs,  metric = \"roc_auc\")  \n\nautoplot(glmnet_rs)\n\nclassification_fit <- wf %>% \n  finalize_workflow(select_best(glmnet_rs,  metric = \"roc_auc\")) %>% \n learn_rate =  tune(),\n   min_n = tune(),\n   loss_reduction = 0\n  ) %>% \n  set_engine(engine = \"lightgbm\",\n             is_unbalance = TRUE,\n             num_leaves = tune(),\n          # boost_tree_lgbm_spec) \n\nparam <- wf %>%\n   extract_parameter_set_dials() %>%\n   recipes::update(\n      min_n = min_n(range = c(1, 7)),\n      tree_depth = tree_depth(range = c(50, 90)),\n lightgbm::lgb.importance() %>% \n  lightgbm::lgb.plot.importance()  \n\n```         \n                   \n                   \n\n\n## Stacks\n\n```{r}\n#| label: stacks\n#| warning: false\n#|
